attributes.action: stopping people who claim mobility having big cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: they should only be allowed a base model vehicle eg micra,corsa. not atop of the range 4x4 or people carriers. only big enough for there immediate selfs

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
